price: پاشان خوا خۆش دەبێت لەپاش ئەوە لە ھەر کەسێک کە بیەوێت وە خوا لێ بوردە و میھرەبانە
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
